dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S785 IS: Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sullivan (for himself and Ms. Murkowski) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the Alaska Native Vietnam era Veterans Land Allotment Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act.

section.header: Extension of Alaska Native Vietnam era veterans land allotment program
section.text: Section 1119(b)(3)(B) of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act (43 U.S.C. 1629gâ€“1(b)(3)(B)) is amended by striking 5-year period and inserting 10-year period.
